resources.string: OsmAnd Ski is a plugin to install and update ski pistes view on Osmand.
~12MB of ski trails will be downloaded.

OsmAnd Ski will install world-wide ski trails (~8MB of data) in your OsmAnd data directory. This give you free access to an offline map containing more than 20\'000km of downhill ski pistes, 23\'000 km of crosscountry, 13\'000 km of lifts world-wide. Requires OsmAnd.
Don\'t forget to change the renderer in OsmAnd.\n Go to Settings > Maps > Vector Renderer and choose Winter.
Contribute !\n These ski maps are updated and offered for free, thanks to OpenStreetMap. Start your GPS while skiing and contribute to OpenStreetMap.
Error connecting to ski pistes data server. \n Report to webmaster@pistes-nordiques.org
Your OsmAnd version is not supported, you should consider update to OsmAnd 0.7.0 or OsmAnd+ 0.7.0
Neither Osmand nor Osmand+ is installed.
